name: EmailRetainerInvoiceToCustomer
description:
Send a retainer invoice to a customer via email.

This tool emails a retainer invoice to the specified customer. If no custom content is provided, the email will use the default content.

parameters.name: organization_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the organization.

parameters.name: retainer_invoice_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the retainer invoice to be emailed.

value_schema.description: Unique identifier of the retainer invoice.

parameters.name: email_attachments
parameters.description: List of file paths or URLs for files to attach to the email.

value_schema.description: Files to be attached to the email

parameters.name: custom_email_request_body
parameters.description: Optional JSON object to customize the email. Includes fields like 'send_from_org_email_id', 'to_mail_ids', 'cc_mail_ids', 'subject', and 'body'.

send_from_org_email_id.description: Boolean to trigger the email from the organization's email address

to_mail_ids.description: Array of email address of the recipients.

cc_mail_ids.description: Array of email address of the recipients to be cced.

parameters.name: send_customer_statement
parameters.description: Set to true to send the customer statement PDF with the email.

value_schema.description: Send customer statement pdf a with email.

parameters.name: attach_invoice_to_email
parameters.description: Attach the retainer invoice to the email if true. Accepts a boolean value.

value_schema.description: Send the retainer invoice attachment a with the email.
